page.title: 11Tourism in East Buckland
page.content: Mr.and Mrs. Lyons own a resturant and guest house called The Lower Pitt Farm.They have been running it for 7 years.they have 3 rooms for guests and can cater for about 20 people in their resturant in the evening. They advertise in the local newspaper but get most of their customers from recommendations from previous guests. In case of drought,which has happened during the last 2 summers they have a well to provide water. They chose the meat they serve in the resturant at the butcher's but have their other food delivered having ordered it iver the phone. The new linkroad wiil bring more people to the area so they support it. They employ students as part-time cleaners and waiters during the summer.They grow their own vegtables and herbs to get good quality produce.
